Healthcare IT Operations Leader: Mentor, Strategic Planning, Software & Hardware Compliance

NTT DATA (Formerly Dell) connects people to the right technology and processes to accelerate innovation to move technology forward. Oversee operational execution for IT infrastructure, departmental operations, compliance, service management, project management and resource leadership.  Accomplishments•	Built a high-performing team, generating a top 97% customer satisfaction score.•	Conceived and led IT team to create a software tracking database.•	Completed a successful refresh of 98% of all outdated PC and laptop equipment.•	Negotiated cost reduction on multiple projects.
Director of IT: Dynamic Negotiator, Vision, Business Modeling, System & Software Applications
CONCENTRIC HEALTHCARE SOLUTIONS INC. / ALARYS HOME HEALTH INC.

CONCENTRIC HEALTHCARE SOLUTIONS INC./ ALARYS HOME HEALTH INC. is a leader in home care services committed to providing the best quality of care.  Managed the IT infrastructure for 2 fast growing businesses along with all contract and vendor management.  Direct and participate in the design, implementation and upgrade of organizational information systems and software applications.  Accomplishments•	Collaborated with executive leadership on IT strategic vision.•	Scaled 12 physical servers into 2 VM physical Dell PowerEdge T420’s and 2 Iomega px4300r’s.•	Reduced costs by 28% per month and executed a strategic plan for a multi-phase with sourcing and initiating a cloud based phone system and internet service from a single provider.•	Significantly reduced payment turnaround times from 6 weeks to 2-3 days with a new Alarys business model from a paper based billing system.
Managed Services Manager: IT Support, SLA management, Project Management, Revenue Growth

ETS provides proactive IT management, network consulting and support services. The company is dedicated to providing exceptional customer service and building strong client relations ships. Supervised IT Support to over 100 clients with a team of 12 technicians in addition to SLA management.  Accomplishments•	Increased SLAs numbers from 45% to 90% within 7 months.•	Oversaw large-scale multi-site PC refresh project with no downtime or disruption to work flow.•	Exceeded $1M in revenue within 1st year generated by improving efficiencies and reducing expenses.
IT Manager: Efficiency Growth, Negotiations, Vendor Management, Transition Management, Lowering Cost

Provided IT operational services to 16 businesses along with managing the transition of the IT business to ETS.  Accomplishments•	Executed effective negotiations to reduce internet and telephone contracts by 15% per month for each client. •	Created a quick ROI for purchasing company.•	Negotiated new caps on annual increases to reduce SLAs from the vendors.

summary: Proven leader with IT experience who has demonstrated exceptional success in developing high-performing teams to partner with cross-functional departments to align innovative solutions, organizational objectives and customer expectations.  Dedicated to identifying strengths in team members to provide professional development and empowering them to create and innovate. Recognized for dynamic leadership style and team performance. Administer full system integration and upgrades from concept and design through launch and refinement. Adept ability in aligning IT infrastructure with an organization’s mission and business strategies.  Focused on identifying opportunities to implement improvements and changes to reduce costs, to keep the organization competitive and in line with technology advances. Demonstrate a keen ability to communicate clearly while motivating and supporting others. Accomplishments:•	Coached technicians in sharpening their strengths, leading to their evolving professionally and growing into exceptional assets to contribute to an engaged, goal-driven team.•	Leading change management to improve efficiency, cost reduction, business evolution alignment and technology utilization.•	Recognize operating inefficiencies and bottlenecks in corporate operations and remove the chokepoints to allow a more efficient operational flow.Expertise:Healthcare, Technology, IT, Implementation and Design, Leadership, Process and System Implementation, Capacity Planning, Risk Assessment and Management,  Efficiency Improvements, Change Management, Budgeting and Financial Oversight, Policy Development, Hiring and Supervision, Vendor Management, Contract Negotiations, Project Management, Vendor Management, Contract Negotiation, Cost Reduction, ROI, TCO, Budget Planning, Sourcing, Strategic Alignment, Improvement, High Performance Team Building, Project Management, Best Practices, Innovative, Conversion Mapping, Teaching, Coaching, Professional Development
